channel.title: Ballerina Type Guide on Ballerina Tips
channel.description: Recent content in Ballerina Type Guide on Ballerina Tips

item.title: Nil - ()
item.description: The nil basic data type represents A single value, that represents absence of any other value.

item.title: Boolean
item.description: The boolean basic data type represents Boolean values; true, false.

item.title: Int
item.description: The int basic data type represents 64-bit signed integer values.

item.title: Float
item.description: The float basic data type represents 64-bit IEEE 754-2008 binary floating point numbers.
